Used to trigger an event on an [[entity]].

== Syntax ==

: <code>event entity <target: target> <eventName: string></code>

== Arguments ==
{{argument|be=1|target: target|CommandSelector<Actor>}}
: {{arg desc|amount=multiple|type=entities|be=actor}}
: Specifies the target(s) to execute an entity event.

{{argument|be=1|eventName: string|basic_string}}
: Specifies the in-game event for the entity. Should be a [[spawn event]] (event name for entities in [[behavior pack]]).
: {{arg desc|be=string}}
